an1.140-149:4.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū adhammaṃ adhammoti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1.140-149:4.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī”ti.
an1.140-149:7.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū dhammaṃ dhammoti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1.140-149:7.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī”ti.
an1.140-149:10.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū avinayaṃ avinayoti dīpenti … pe … vinayaṃ vinayoti dīpenti … pe … abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti … pe … bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti … pe … anāciṇṇaṃ tathāgatena anāciṇṇaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti … pe … āciṇṇaṃ tathāgatena āciṇṇaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti … pe … apaññattaṃ tathāgatena apaññattaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti … pe … paññattaṃ tathāgatena paññattaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti;
an1.140-149:10.2: te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1.140-149:10.3: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī”ti.
